ygData.subject: Earth2025 is gonna think I moded, but... (OOC)
ygData.msgSnippet: The only way his bomb could pass detection was if it had a Destron signal, and only one of extreme importance, the Virus I decided to wipe out the computer

The only way his bomb could pass detection was if it had a Destron signal, =
and only one of extreme importance, the Virus I decided to wipe out the com=
puter system, a fail safe kicked in, and the new computer doesn't recognize=
 any signals, Destron or otherwise, it will shoot everything, it assessed t=
hat if It shot the bomb it would bring harm to the ship, it can't allow tha=
t to happen, so it ejected it, where it goes is up to Earth2025. The only b=
ot that can enter the ship is Shredder, because Magmatron gave him a device=
 so the computers would recognize him as a Destron, actually, I believe Bat=
tera still has one.
